attributes.action: Stop standing by and watching people being killed and maimed in Zimbabwe on the dubious premise of international diplomacy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Innocent people are having their eyes plucked out and tongues cut out while still alive for daring to voice their opinion against Mugabe's regime. Hundreds of people are being killed. Please, Gordon, rescue your unimpressive reign as Prime Minister by leading the world against this dictator. Have the courage to be absolute. Dedicate your time to the worthwhile. Make things happen. This simply cannot go on. People are sickened by what they are seeing and it is your job to take a stance for Britain - do it now and make sure it is effective (Rob Smith, Birmingham)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
